subject: Re: Jwebunit Question
msgSnippet: Hi, I am new to JWebUnit & trying to use it for my jsp pages. But I am getting AssertionFailedError with message No form present. I m using following code
messageBody:
Hi,

I am new to JWebUnit & trying to use it for my jsp pages.
But I am getting "AssertionFailedError" with message "No form
present."
I m using following code lines to set page & form elemnts method:

getTestContext().setBaseUrl("http://localhost:8080/test");

beginAt("sample.jsp");

assertFormElementPresent("login");

any help would be highly appreciated.

I m not having any good stuff on this topic so I can't do any R&D
for the code...



--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "lusujin2002" <lusujin2002@y...> wrote:
>
> I'm currently trying to use jwebunit for one of my webapplicatins.
> And encountering an issue with the clickLinkWithText method.
>
> The problem is that, upon clicking the link, I suspect that it does
> not go to the next page.
>
> This is my code snippets:
> assertLinkPresentWithText("Next");
> clickLinkWithText("Next");
> assertTitleEquals("New Page Title");
>
> What happens after this is that the assertTitle fails as it
displays
> the old previous page's title.
>
> I have checked my web application and the links exists.
>
> Any clues on this strange issue?
>
> Thanks in advance.
>
